title: My Career
subTitle: Diverse and dynamic career across multiple industries

contents.title: I have experience working in one of the largest insurance companies in the UK:
text: Working on customer portal using React for quick and iterative development
Conducting unit tests using Jest and React-testing-library
Professionally utilizing GitHub and regularly reviewing code
Collaborating closely with Product Owners and Business Analysts
Supporting team members throughout the development process
Utilizing agile Scrum methodology for efficient project management

contents.title: Developed the front-end of a booking website that catered to the pandemic:
text: Front end working experience using Blazor framework
Proficient responsive website design experience with Blazorise (Bulma Framework)
Closely worked with UX/UI designer, tester and focused on precisely achieving the design as well as delivering a friendly UX

contents.title: Trainee Product Consultant with a primary focus on front-end web development:
text: Individually worked on an application form project using Object-oriented JavaScript combined with HTML/CSS and database
Widget design by jQuery and HTML

contents.title: Front-End Software Engineering with a focus on data:
text: Front end experience with HTML, CSS/SCSS, Bootstrap 4 in .NET MVC framework
Working on multiple projects and support tickets using JavaScript (jQuery)
Worked in an agile environment with a good understanding of Scrum/Kanban
